Interface IRTMPConnManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.red5.server.net.rtmp.RTMPConnection createConnection(Class<?> connCls)
      Creates a connection based on the given RTMPConnection class.
      org.red5.server.net.rtmp.RTMPConnection getConnection(int clientId)
      Returns a connection matching the given client id.

      Removes a connection matching the client id specified.
      Collection<org.red5.server.net.rtmp.RTMPConnection> removeConnections()
      Removes all the connections from the set.

      • removeConnection

        org.red5.server.net.rtmp.RTMPConnection removeConnection(int clientId)
        Removes a connection matching the client id specified. If found, the connection will be returned.
        Parameters:
        clientId - client id
        Returns:
        connection
